title: Clear night city driving with moderate speed and frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a city street at moderate speed with frequent braking.

The street is well-lit with streetlights and there are several buildings in the background. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed because it is in a city environment where the speed limit is lower. The frequent braking events are likely due to the presence of other vehicles or pedestrians on the road. The ego vehicle is constantly monitoring its surroundings and adjusting its speed and braking accordingly to ensure safe driving.
